name: Basketio
description:
Try to get the most score you can! 
Each score increases the speed of the plank.
If you miss, you lose a life.
Throw: [space] 
Move: [A][D] ; [🠔][➞]
Reset: [R]

(This game is in very early stages yet. Not many visual elements can be found in it. The game only for test gameplay logic and to stay tuned if you enjoy it.)

Feel free to leave a comment and suggest things you would love to see in the final edition.
